Release Notes:

Shadows Are Security AS I LAY DYING&#039;s sophomore album on metal indie
powerhouse label Metal Blade Records is slated for release on June
14th. AS I LAY DYING became known the world over with their prior
release "Frail Words Collapse" and since, has scanned over 120,000
copies in the United States. Fans eagerly await the new release of
Shadow Are Security, (produced by band vocalist Tim Lambesis and
Steve Russell, Engineered By: Steve Russell and Mixed By: Andy
Sneap).

Sand Diego based metal-core quintet AS I LAY DYING trekked the US
this spring with All That Remains, Throwdown and Winter Solstice;
preparing for the ruckus they will cause on this Summers Famed
Ozzfest Tour. Featured as a co-headliner on the second stage, whose
acts reflect the forefront of what is happening now in the metal
and hardcore circuit.

Enjoy!
